markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wary Skulker](/Feats.aspx?ID=1264) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 11 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Ever alert, you scout for danger even when you are trying to stay hidden. You can perform the [Scout](/Actions.aspx?ID=518) exploration activity at the same time as the [Avoid Notice](/Actions.aspx?ID=511) exploration activity.
name: Wary Skulker
